Frequently Asked Questions

1. What is the Directory Boilerplate?

The Directory Boilerplate is a ready-made, fully-featured directory platform designed to help you launch a directory-based website quickly and efficiently. It includes user authentication, an admin dashboard, payment integration, and advanced search functionality—all customizable to fit your brand.

2. What tech stack is used in the Directory Boilerplate?

The boilerplate is built using modern and popular technologies:

  • Next.js for the frontend and server-side rendering.
  • Tailwind CSS for styling, offering a modern, responsive design.
  • Supabase for the backend and data storage, providing real-time capabilities and a familiar SQL interface.
  • Clerk for user authentication and management.
  • Stripe for payment processing, allowing you to monetize your directory with ease.

3. What exactly do I get when I purchase the Directory Boilerplate?

You get access to the complete source code of the Directory Boilerplate. This includes:

  • A fully functional directory platform.
  • Comprehensive user authentication and role management.
  • Admin dashboard for managing listings, ads, and sponsorships.
  • Integrated payment system with Stripe.
  • Advanced search functionality and customizable frontend.

4. How can I use the Directory Boilerplate?

After purchasing, you'll receive access to a private GitHub repository where you can fork the project and start customizing it to your needs. The boilerplate is designed to be easy to set up and modify, so you can tailor it to your specific business requirements.

5. How many hours does it save?

Building a similar directory platform from scratch could take an experienced developer approximately 75 to 105 hours—nearly 3 to 4 weeks of full-time work. By purchasing this boilerplate, you save all that time and effort, allowing you to focus on growing your business instead of building the foundational elements.

6. Can I request additional features?

While we continually strive to improve the boilerplate with new features and updates, we do not take on custom feature requests or development work for individual clients. However, we value your feedback and are always open to suggestions for future updates.

7. What kind of support do you offer?

We are committed to helping you get the most out of the Directory Boilerplate. While we provide support for setting up and using the boilerplate, we do not offer custom development services or work on clients' directories directly. Our goal is to empower you with the tools you need to succeed, and we are here to assist with any questions or issues related to the boilerplate itself.

8. Do you offer refunds?

Due to the nature of digital products, all sales of the Directory Boilerplate are final, and we do not offer refunds. We recommend reviewing all available information and documentation before making your purchase to ensure it meets your needs.

9. How is the Directory Boilerplate licensed?

The Directory Boilerplate is licensed for personal and commercial use. However, it is a non-transferable license, meaning you cannot resell or redistribute the code in its original or modified form. By purchasing, you agree to these terms and are responsible for ensuring your use complies with the license agreement.

10. Can I customize the boilerplate to fit my brand?

Absolutely! The Directory Boilerplate is fully customizable. You can easily modify the design, add or remove features, and adjust the layout to match your brand's identity. The code is well-documented and structured to make customization as straightforward as possible.

11. How do I deploy the Directory Boilerplate?

The boilerplate is designed to be deployed on popular platforms like Vercel. Simply follow the setup instructions included in the documentation, and you can have your directory up and running in no time.

12. Do I need to know how to code to use this boilerplate?

While the boilerplate is designed to be user-friendly, some knowledge of web development is recommended to fully customize and deploy it. If you are comfortable with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, you should be able to navigate and modify the boilerplate with ease.

13. What makes this boilerplate different from others?

Our Directory Boilerplate is a comprehensive, all-in-one solution that combines a powerful backend with a sleek, modern frontend. It includes everything you need to launch a directory-based website quickly and effectively, with no recurring fees and full control over the source code.

14. How do I get started?

After purchase, you'll receive instructions on how to access the GitHub repository. From there, you can fork the project, customize it to your needs, and deploy it to your preferred hosting platform. Detailed documentation is provided to guide you through each step of the process.

); } export default FAQSection;
